API.APIName: Collection alert based on date and time
API.APIDesc: It will be used to fetch the JSON requests of collection alerts based on date or time.
This API will help user to create a virtual account
Through RBL, a registered user can raise request for money from another registered user. Funds will be transferred when the user authorizes the collection.
This API will generate Reference key against Aadhaar number.
This  API enables the client to perform AML check for both the remitter and beneficiary to avoid money laundering activities.
AePS API allows customers to withdraw cash using their Aadhaar & fingerprint.
This API can be consumed by corporate who have nodal arrangement with bank .This API enables to capture the KYC details of merchants registered with aggregators.
This API will be used to create user session.
Get customer account statement API helps to fetch statement in PDF format based on passing account number and date range. Date range should not be more than 92 days.
